review: Great value. This is the second Fire Stick I've purchased. I love the quality and the ease of setup. Works first time and every time. The quality of the unit is obvious and the intuitive nature of using the controller is a major plus. It simply does what it says it's going to do and it does it perfectly. What can be better than that?

review: Would get 5 star if the power came from USB, just a mini Fire TV, a little slower on the processor side but great for smaller rooms that you still want the Fire TV access to. I just don't understand why it still needs to be plugged into 110 power source, Most TVs now have USB and I would think there would be a viable way to source the power to the stick via USB to prevent unnecessary cords from hanging down, especially since it puts undue stress on the HDMI port. 5 start if this "problem" is resolved, at least provide us with a longer mini-power cable so the TV doesn't have to be 4 ft. from a power source.
